title: 2014 (No. 1 of 2014)) of the Local Government Act 2001 (No. 37 of 2001) and
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Local Government Rates
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Local Government Rates 

(Financial Procedures) Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 1 January 2024. 

Definitions
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited local government rate (financial procedures) regulation 2023 (2) regulation come operation 1 january 2024 definition

title: 2014 (No. 1 of 2014)) of the Local Government Act 2001 (No. 37 of 2001) and
heading: In these Regulations-
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations- 

“Act” means Local Government Rates and Other Matter Act 2019 (No. 24 of 
2019); 

“Act of 2023” means Historic and Archaeological Heritage and Miscellaneous 
Provisions Act 2023 (No. 26 of 2023). 

Notice of the levying of rates
text_norm: 2 regulations- act mean local government rate matter act 2019 (no 24 2019) act 2023 mean historic archaeological heritage miscellaneous provision act 2023 (no 26 2023) notice levying rate

title: 2014 (No. 1 of 2014)) of the Local Government Act 2001 (No. 37 of 2001) and
heading: 3. (1) Within 14 days of the first day of the local financial year each rating
text_raw:
3. (1) Within 14 days of the first day of the local financial year each rating 
authority shall publish on its website and in one or more newspapers 
circulating in the administrative area in which rates have been imposed by the 
authority under section 4(1) (inserted by section 263 of the Act of 2023) of the 
Act, a notice, signed by the Chief Executive of the rating authority. 

(2) A notice referred to in paragraph (1) shall include the following 

information: 

(a) 

the name of rating authority, 

(b) 

the address of rating authority, 

(c) 

(d) 

the annual rate on valuation, and 

any other information the Chief Executive considers to be 
relevant. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 26th December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [696] 3 

Schedule of uncollected rates
text_norm: 3 (1) within 14 day first day local financial year rating authority shall publish website one newspaper circulating administrative area rate imposed authority section 4(1) (inserted section 263 act 2023) act notice signed chief executive rating authority (2) notice referred paragraph (1) shall include following information (a) name rating authority (b) address rating authority (c) (d) annual rate valuation information chief executive considers relevant notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 26th december 2023 696 3 schedule uncollected rate

title: 2014 (No. 1 of 2014)) of the Local Government Act 2001 (No. 37 of 2001) and
heading: 4. A rating authority shall, not later than 45 days after the close of a local
text_raw:
4. A rating authority shall, not later than 45 days after the close of a local 
financial year, prepare a schedule of uncollected rates at the close of that year 
and indicate thereon the reasons for non-collection of the rates. 

Reference to rateable valuation multiplier
text_norm: 4 rating authority shall later 45 day close local financial year prepare schedule uncollected rate close year indicate thereon reason non-collection rate reference rateable valuation multiplier

title: 2014 (No. 1 of 2014)) of the Local Government Act 2001 (No. 37 of 2001) and
heading: 5. Any reference to a rateable valuation multiplier in any document of a
text_raw:
5. Any reference to a rateable valuation multiplier in any document of a 

rating authority shall be read as a reference to an annual rate on valuation. 

Date revision of valuation becomes effective
text_norm: 5 reference rateable valuation multiplier document rating authority shall read reference annual rate valuation date revision valuation becomes effective

title: 2014 (No. 1 of 2014)) of the Local Government Act 2001 (No. 37 of 2001) and
heading: 6. For the purpose of section 4(9) (inserted by section 263 of the Act of
text_raw:
6. For the purpose of section 4(9) (inserted by section 263 of the Act of 
2023) of the Act, it is prescribed that the date on which the valuation of a 
relevant property on the valuation list is amended by a rating authority is the 
effective valuation date as set out on a valuation certificate or notice sent by 
Tailte Éireann in respect of the property to the rating authority. 

Revocation
text_norm: 6 purpose section 4(9) (inserted section 263 act 2023) act prescribed date valuation relevant property valuation list amended rating authority effective valuation date set valuation certificate notice sent tailte eireann respect property rating authority revocation

title: 2014 (No. 1 of 2014)) of the Local Government Act 2001 (No. 37 of 2001) and
heading: 7. Part 4 of the Local Government (Financial and Audit Procedures)
text_raw:
7. Part 4 of the Local Government (Financial and Audit Procedures) 

Regulations 2014 (S. I. No. 226 of 2014) is revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 December, 2023. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [696]
text_norm: 7 part 4 local government (financial audit procedures) regulation 2014 (s i no 226 2014) revoked given official seal 20 december 2023 darragh brien minister housing local government heritage 4 696

title: 2014 (No. 1 of 2014)) of the Local Government Act 2001 (No. 37 of 2001) and
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations update the rates procedures for rating authorities at the start 
of the local financial year and prescribe the effective valuation date for 
revisions of valuations notified by Tailte Eireann to rating authorities. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [696] 5
